package.name: shutdown-dummy
package.unpack: if [ -f ${SRCDIR}/${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}.tar.bz2 ] ; then tar xjf ${SRCDIR}/${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}.tar.bz2 else tar xzf ${SRCDIR}/${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}.tar.gz fi
package.install: cd ${PKGNAME} mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/sbin mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/applications mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/lesslinux/shutdown-dummy install -m 0755 shutdown ${TGTDIR}/sbin install -m 0755 shutdown-wrapper.sh ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin install -m 0755 shutdown.desktop ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/applications install -m 0755 shutdown-dummy.rb ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/lesslinux/shutdown-dummy install -m 0644 shutdown-dummy.xml ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/lesslinux/shutdown-dummy
